title: ODD: A Benchmark Dataset for the Natural Language Processing Based Opioid Related Aberrant Behavior Detection
details: S Kwon, X Wang, W Liu, E Druhl, M Sung, J Reisman… - Proceedings of the 2024 …, 2024
abstract: Opioid related aberrant behaviors (ORABs) present novel risk factors for opioid overdose. This paper introduces a novel biomedical natural language processing benchmark dataset named ODD, for ORAB Detection Dataset. ODD is an expert …

title: Developing a Medical Chatbot: Integrating Medical Knowledge into GPT for Healthcare Applications
details: M Gams, M Smerkol, P Kocuvan, M Zadobovšek - … of Workshops and Demos & Videos …, 2024
abstract: In this study, we explore the integration of ChatGPT with the Insieme platform, a robust electronic and mobile health system designed as an Italian and Slovenian project. This integration provides a novel way in which users access medical …
